actions.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendments (A004) Failed by voice vote.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mrs. Lowey.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowey amendments (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Lowey amendments (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mrs. Lowey.

description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 19, 39, 47, 58, 65, 76, 77, 79, 85, 88, 98, 113, 162, 181, 188, 201, 207, 214, 225, 242, 248, 249, 268, 296, 309, 325, 326, and 333.
